column4: just installed hardy, playing video on youtube works (no sound yet), but playing video on google video does not
is that a known issue?
no
you are sure you have'nt installed any blocking extensions
only chatzilla :-)
what do you mean by "blocking extensions"?
adblock,flashblock and the like...
no, only non-ubufox extension installed is chatzilla (and the problem was the same before I installed that)
can you post a screenshot of the google video page?
flash should'nt care about the site
and a google site wont have codeing errors
*coding
go on
amazing! i have the same problem
never knew
aren'nt the videos at video.google also available on youtube?
google owns youtube after all
I think google has been busy recently improving integration with other sites
so it's possible it worked for you earlier
hey...all videos have a "watch on youtube" link
you said youtube worked fine right, so you could use the youtube links
yes -- though would be nice to discover a workaround
